Text: Isn't there a way to alter the files that the ps3 will recognize the files without having a specific kind of usb? so that you can use a standard thumb drive? I've been reading up on the mod steps and would like to go about the operation without spending any money, let me know if you have any ideas.

I have an IDEA. Your a bum, and spend some fucking money to buy the necessary modding hardware, cuz ounce you have it and do the steps the RIGHT way you will always have the tools. If you get good enough you can start modding other peoples, before long the hardware will pay itself off.
hey, i programmed the teensy board with the hex and the backupmanager, its not working am i missing something?
i did some online searches and i guess psgroove doesnt work with new firmware? wats the point lol i want to play my new games.
Or, you could just follow the guide on www.modyourps3.com ? Worked well for me :)
